summary: Complete frontend testing of Frontal Équestre Configurator - REFACTORED VERSION with HTML Canvas and 33 hardcoded stone positions. All tests passed (100%). Features verified: 4 stone styles (Marron, Saphir, Noir Diamant, Fushia), pattern repetition logic (1-4 styles), 33 strass display, clear all button, individual style removal, PNG export, fixed price 39€, mobile responsiveness at 375px.

critical_code_review_comments: App.js well-structured with 33 hardcoded stone positions in STONE_POSITIONS array

data-testid attributes implemented on all interactive elements for testing
Responsive CSS with breakpoints at 768px and 480px
Clean separation of concerns: image loading, canvas drawing, state management
context_for_next_testing_agent: Complete refactor from previous version. Now uses HTML Canvas with 33 hardcoded stone positions (not 99). Single size (no Poney/Cob/Full/XL). Individual stone images (stone-marron.png, stone-saphir.png, stone-noir-diamant.png, stone-fushia.png) instead of sprite sheet. Base image is base-frontal-clean.png without green marker dots. Export generates PNG via canvas.toDataURL(). All interactive elements have data-testid attributes.
